<div type="collation" xml:id="C17">
<seg sID="C17_app1-fMS"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C17"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.07" unit="tei:head"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__1"/> <seg eID="C17_app1-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app2-fMS"/> Vol. II <lb n="c57-0002__main__2"/>Chap I <seg eID="C17_app2-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0002.07"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C17_app6-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__3"/>"It <seg eID="C17_app6-fMS"/> is with difficulty that I remember <lb n="c57-0002__main__4"/>the <seg sID="C17_app11-fMS"/> æra <seg eID="C17_app11-fMS"/> of my <seg sID="C17_app13-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e35">cr</del> being. <seg eID="C17_app13-fMS"/> All the events of <lb n="c57-0002__main__5"/>that period appear confused & indistinct. <seg sID="C17_app15-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e42">I know only that I felt a strang<unclear>e</unclear> </del> A strange <seg eID="C17_app15-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app16-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__7"/>sensation <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e50">sea</del> <seg eID="C17_app16-fMS"/> seized <seg sID="C17_app18-fMS"/> me <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e53">and a it appeared</del> <seg eID="C17_app18-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__8"/>I saw, <seg sID="C17_app20-fMS"/> felt heard <seg eID="C17_app20-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C17_app22-fMS"/> smelt <seg eID="C17_app22-fMS"/> at the same <seg sID="C17_app24-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__9"/>time <seg eID="C17_app24-fMS"/> and it <seg sID="C17_app26-fMS"/> was indeed <seg eID="C17_app26-fMS"/> a long time <w ana="start"/>be<lb n="c57-0002__main__10"/>fore<w ana="end"/> I learned to distinguish between the <seg sID="C17_app28-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__11"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0002.01"/><lb n="c57-0002__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e75"> <sga-add sID="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e77"/>various <sga-add eID="c57-0002__left_margin__d4e77"/> </del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e81"> <retrace cause="unclear"> </retrace> </del> operations of my various senses. By <seg eID="C17_app28-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app29-fMS"/> degrees <seg eID="C17_app29-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__12"/>I <seg sID="C17_app31-fMS"/> remember <seg eID="C17_app31-fMS"/> a stronger light pressed upon <lb n="c57-0002__main__13"/>my <seg sID="C17_app33-fMS"/> nerves <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e94">and</del> <seg eID="C17_app33-fMS"/> so that I was obliged to <seg sID="C17_app35-fMS"/> close <seg eID="C17_app35-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__14"/>my eyes. Darkness then came over <seg sID="C17_app37-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C17_app37-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__15"/>and troubled <seg sID="C17_app39-fMS"/> me.– <seg eID="C17_app39-fMS"/> But hardly had I felt <seg sID="C17_app43-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__16"/>this when (by <seg eID="C17_app43-fMS"/> opening my <seg sID="C17_app45-fMS"/> eyes <seg eID="C17_app45-fMS"/> as I now <seg sID="C17_app47-fMS"/> suppose) <seg eID="C17_app47-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__17"/>the light poured in upon me <seg sID="C17_app49-fMS"/> again– <seg eID="C17_app49-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C17_app51-fMS"/> walked <lb n="c57-0002__main__18"/>and <seg eID="C17_app51-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C17_app53-fMS"/> believe <seg eID="C17_app53-fMS"/> descended; but <seg sID="C17_app55-fMS"/> presently I <seg eID="C17_app55-fMS"/> found <lb n="c57-0002__main__19"/>a great <seg sID="C17_app58-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e112">difference</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/>alteration <seg eID="C17_app58-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/>in my <seg sID="C17_app60-fMS"/> sensations; before <seg eID="C17_app60-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__20"/>dark opaque bodies had surrounded me<sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/>, <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__21"/>impervious to my touch or <seg sID="C17_app64-fMS"/> sight – and <seg eID="C17_app64-fMS"/> I <lb n="c57-0002__main__22"/>now found that I could wander on at <seg sID="C17_app66-fMS"/> liberty <seg eID="C17_app66-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__23"/>with no obstacles which I could not either <lb n="c57-0002__main__24"/>surmount or <seg sID="C17_app68-fMS"/> avoid– <seg eID="C17_app68-fMS"/> The light <seg sID="C17_app70-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e133">be</del> became <seg eID="C17_app70-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app71-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/>more <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/>&<lb n="c57-0002__main__25"/> more <seg eID="C17_app71-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app72-fMS"/> opressive <seg eID="C17_app72-fMS"/> to <seg sID="C17_app74-fMS"/> me and <seg eID="C17_app74-fMS"/> the heat wearying <lb n="c57-0002__main__26"/>me as I <seg sID="C17_app76-fMS"/> walked <seg eID="C17_app76-fMS"/> I sought a place where I could <seg sID="C17_app78-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0002__main__27"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.02"/> perceive <anchor xml:id="c57-0002.04"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.03"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/>recieve <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0002.05"/> <seg eID="C17_app78-fMS"/> shade. This was the forest near <seg sID="C17_app80-fMS"/> Ingolstadt,<lb n="c57-0002__main__28"/>and <seg eID="C17_app80-fMS"/> here by the side of a brook <seg sID="C17_app84-fMS"/> I lay <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e171">weary</del> <lb n="c57-0002__main__29"/>for some hours <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/>resting from my <seg eID="C17_app84-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app85-fMS"/> fatigue <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/> untill <seg eID="C17_app85-fMS"/> I felt tormented by <lb n="c57-0002__main__30"/>hunger and thirst. This roused me from my nearly <lb n="c57-0003__main__1"/>dormant <seg sID="C17_app87-fMS"/> state <seg eID="C17_app87-fMS"/> and I ate some berries <lb n="c57-0003__main__2"/>which I found <seg sID="C17_app89-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/>hanging <seg eID="C17_app89-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/>on the <seg sID="C17_app91-fMS"/> trees <seg eID="C17_app91-fMS"/> or lying on <lb n="c57-0003__main__3"/>the <seg sID="C17_app93-fMS"/> ground – <seg eID="C17_app93-fMS"/> I slaked my thirst <seg sID="C17_app95-fMS"/> by <seg eID="C17_app95-fMS"/> the <seg sID="C17_app97-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__4"/>brook <seg eID="C17_app97-fMS"/> and then <seg sID="C17_app99-fMS"/> again lying <seg eID="C17_app99-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app100-fMS"/> down I <seg eID="C17_app100-fMS"/> was <lb n="c57-0003__main__5"/>overcome by <seg sID="C17_app102-fMS"/> sleep <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> <mdel>–</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/>; <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> It <seg eID="C17_app102-fMS"/> was dark when I <seg sID="C17_app104-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__6"/>awoke, <seg eID="C17_app104-fMS"/> I felt cold <seg sID="C17_app106-fMS"/> also <seg eID="C17_app106-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C17_app108-fMS"/> half frightened <lb n="c57-0003__main__7"/><mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C17_app108-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/>as it were <seg sID="C17_app110-fMS"/> instinctively <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/> on <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e246">seein</del> <seg eID="C17_app110-fMS"/> finding myself so desolate. <lb n="c57-0003__main__8"/>Before I had quitted you<sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/>r <seg sID="C17_app112-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/> appartment <seg eID="C17_app112-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__9"/>on a sensation of <seg sID="C17_app114-fMS"/> cold <seg eID="C17_app114-fMS"/> I had covered <seg sID="C17_app116-fMS"/> my<lb n="c57-0003__main__10"/>self <seg eID="C17_app116-fMS"/> with some <seg sID="C17_app118-fMS"/> clothes, <seg eID="C17_app118-fMS"/> but these were <seg sID="C17_app120-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__11"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e261">not</del> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>in <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>sufficient <seg eID="C17_app120-fMS"/> to secure me from the <seg sID="C17_app122-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e270">dw</del> dews of night. I was a <seg eID="C17_app122-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app123-fMS"/> poor helpless <seg eID="C17_app123-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__13"/>miserable <seg sID="C17_app125-fMS"/> wretch—I knew <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e275">no</del> <seg eID="C17_app125-fMS"/> & could <seg sID="C17_app127-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__14"/>distinguish <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e281">no</del> nothing <seg eID="C17_app127-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app128-fMS"/> but <seg eID="C17_app128-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app129-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e286">felt</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/> <metamark>^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/>feeling <seg eID="C17_app129-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/>pain <lb n="c57-0003__main__15"/>invade me on all <seg sID="C17_app131-fMS"/> sides <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e300">and</del> <seg eID="C17_app131-fMS"/> I sat down <lb n="c57-0003__main__16"/>and wept. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C17_app133-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__17"/>Soon <seg eID="C17_app133-fMS"/> a gentle light stole over the <seg sID="C17_app135-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__18"/>heavens <seg eID="C17_app135-fMS"/> and gave me a sensation of <seg sID="C17_app137-fMS"/> pleasure <seg eID="C17_app137-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__19"/>I started up, and beheld a radiant form <lb n="c57-0003__main__20"/>rise <seg sID="C17_app139-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e316">am</del> from among the trees. <seg eID="C17_app139-fMS"/> I gazed with <lb n="c57-0003__main__21"/>a kind of <seg sID="C17_app142-fMS"/> wonder – <seg eID="C17_app142-fMS"/> It moved <seg sID="C17_app144-fMS"/> slowly; <seg eID="C17_app144-fMS"/> but <lb n="c57-0003__main__22"/>it enlightened my <seg sID="C17_app146-fMS"/> path, <seg eID="C17_app146-fMS"/> and I again <lb n="c57-0003__main__23"/>went out in search of berries. I was still <seg sID="C17_app148-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__24"/>cold <seg eID="C17_app148-fMS"/> when <seg sID="C17_app150-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e328">on the ground</del> under one of the <lb n="c57-0003__main__25"/>trees I found a huge <seg eID="C17_app150-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app151-fMS"/> cloak <seg eID="C17_app151-fMS"/> with which <seg sID="C17_app153-fMS"/> I– <seg eID="C17_app153-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__26"/>covered myself, and sat down <seg sID="C17_app155-fMS"/> on <seg eID="C17_app155-fMS"/> the ground. <lb n="c57-0003__main__27"/>No distinct ideas occupied my <seg sID="C17_app157-fMS"/> mind <seg eID="C17_app157-fMS"/> all was <seg sID="C17_app159-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__28"/>confused <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e340">and</del> <seg eID="C17_app159-fMS"/> I felt <seg sID="C17_app161-fMS"/> the light, and <seg eID="C17_app161-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app162-fMS"/> hunger <seg eID="C17_app162-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__29"/>and <seg sID="C17_app164-fMS"/> thirst <seg eID="C17_app164-fMS"/> and darkness; innumerable <lb n="c57-0003__main__30"/>sounds rung in my <seg sID="C17_app166-fMS"/> ears <seg eID="C17_app166-fMS"/> and on all sides <lb n="c57-0003__main__31"/>various scents saluted <seg sID="C17_app168-fMS"/> me; <seg eID="C17_app168-fMS"/> the only object <lb n="c57-0003__main__32"/>that I could distinguish was the bright<lb n="c57-0004__main__1"/> <seg sID="C17_app170-fMS"/> moon <seg eID="C17_app170-fMS"/> and <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>I <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>fixed my eyes <seg sID="C17_app173-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/>o <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> n <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e374">th</del> <seg eID="C17_app173-fMS"/> that with <lb n="c57-0004__main__2"/>pleasure. <seg sID="C17_app175-fMS"/> Several <seg eID="C17_app175-fMS"/> changes of day and night <seg sID="C17_app177-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__3"/>passed <seg eID="C17_app177-fMS"/> and the orb of night had greatly <seg sID="C17_app179-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__4"/>lessened <seg eID="C17_app179-fMS"/> when I began to distinguish my <lb n="c57-0004__main__5"/>sensations <seg sID="C17_app181-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e386"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e388"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e388"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e394"/>from each <seg eID="C17_app181-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app182-fMS"/> other– <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e394"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e386"/> . <seg eID="C17_app182-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C17_app184-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e398"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e400">first saw</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e403"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e405">dis</del> gradually saw plainly <seg eID="C17_app184-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e403"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e398"/>the clear stream <lb n="c57-0004__main__6"/>that supplied me with <seg sID="C17_app186-fMS"/> drink <seg eID="C17_app186-fMS"/> and the <seg sID="C17_app188-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e413"> <unclear>gre</unclear> </del> <lb n="c57-0004__main__7"/>trees that <seg eID="C17_app188-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app189-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e420"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e422">covered</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e425"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e425"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e431"/>shaded <seg eID="C17_app189-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e431"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e420"/>me with their foliage. <lb n="c57-0004__main__8"/>I was delighted when I first discovered <lb n="c57-0004__main__9"/>that a pleasant <seg sID="C17_app191-fMS"/> sound <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e439"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e441">that</del> <seg eID="C17_app191-fMS"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e444"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e444"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e439"/>often <seg sID="C17_app194-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0004__main__10"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e451">delighte</del> saluted my <seg eID="C17_app194-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app195-fMS"/> ears <seg eID="C17_app195-fMS"/> proceeded <lb n="c57-0004__main__11"/>from the throats of <seg sID="C17_app197-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e456">son</del> the little <seg eID="C17_app197-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app198-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e459"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e461">anih</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e464"/>winged <seg eID="C17_app198-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C17_app199-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e464"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e459"/><lb n="c57-0004__main__12"/><w ana="start"/>a<mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e473"/> <mdel>m</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e477"/>ni<sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e477"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e473"/>mals<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C17_app199-fMS"/> who often intercepted the light <lb n="c57-0004__main__13"/>from my eyes.
